survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on attendees' networking experiences at professional conferences to improve future event planning.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?

questions.question_text: Which networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include 'Other' option for additional input.

script.question_text: Which networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the most valuable aspect of the conference networking experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Limit to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What was the most valuable aspect of the conference networking experience?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend this conference again based on the networking opportunities?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend this conference again based on the networking opportunities?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking sessions?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Limit to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking sessions?
